skills.desc: Attacks all enemies. Has a 20% chance of placing a 5% [Poison] debuff for 2 turns.
skills.name: Acid Burn

skills.desc: Removes 3 random debuffs from this Champion, then places an [Unkillable] buff for 2 turns. Also places a 7.5% [Continuous Heal] buff on this Champion for 2 turns.
skills.name: Reincarnate

skills.desc: Immune to [Stun], [Freeze], [Sleep], [Provoke], [Block Active Skills], [Block Passive Skills], [Fear], and [True Fear] debuffs. Also immune to HP exchange effects, HP balancing effects, and cooldown increasing effects.
skills.name: Almighty Immunity [Passive]
